name: Relieve
description:
Aim the Ball towards the Gate but wait the Gate is closed now what? You have to open Gate first. 

Complete challenging Physics based levels. Earn Stars to unlock more levels and Characters.

Features

Relaxing and Challenging Levels.
Beautiful Graphics.
Different Unlock-able Balls.
More 64 Unique Levels and more to come!
6 Different Balls
2 Different Modes
Save progress Online so you don't have to complete levels again.
Facebook Connectivity
Play Games Connectivity
